original_text: He removed the high places and broke the pillars and cut down the Asherah. And he broke in pieces the bronze serpent that Moses had made, for until those days the people of Israel had made offerings to it (it was called Nehushtan).
korean_text: 그가 여러 산당들을 제거하며 주상을 깨뜨리며 아세라 목상을 찍으며 모세가 만들었던 놋뱀을 이스라엘 자손이 이때까지 향하여 분향하므로 그것을 부수고 느후스단이라 일컬었더라

sentences.original_text: And he broke in pieces the bronze serpent
for until those days the people of Israel had made offerings to it
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 그때까지 그것에게 제물을 바쳤기 때문입니다
